Design: Blocked RCT, with 2 levels, and randomization done at level 1 (individual level).

Models: Constant treatment effects, fixed treatment effects, and random treatment effects.

```{r knit.options, echo = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(cache = TRUE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE, echo = FALSE)
```

```{r setup}
library(here)
library(pander)    # For good table format
# default tables to round to 3 digits
panderOptions('round', 3)
# simulation and user parameters
source(here::here("Validation/Simulations", "params.R"))
```

```{r universal.params}
# assumptions
user.params.list[['K']] <- 1
user.params.list[['J']] <- 30
user.params.list[['ICC.3']] <- NULL
user.params.list[['omega.3']] <- NULL
user.params.list[['R2.3']] <- NULL
# what we assume for validation
sim.params.list[['S']] <- 1000
params.default <- user.params.list
```

Default parameters:

* M = `r user.params.list[['M']]`
* J = `r user.params.list[['J']]`
* rho: $\rho$ =  `r user.params.list[['rho.default']]`
* ATE ES = `r user.params.list[['ATE_ES']]`
* R2.1: $R^2_1$ = `r user.params.list[['R2.1']]`

Parameters by model type:

* Omega: $\omega_2 = 0$ for constant effects, $\omega_2$ = `r user.params.list[['omega.2']]` for fixed and random
* ICC: $\text{ICC}_2 = 0$ for constant and fixed effects, $\text{ICC}_2$ = `r user.params.list[['ICC.2']]` for random effects

Assumptions:

* Two-level design: $\text{ICC}_3 = 0$,  $\omega_3 = 0$, $K = 1$

# Power Validation

## Base case

```{r 2c.nbar50}
design <- "d2.1_m2fc"
user.params.list[['omega.2']] <- 0
user.params.list[['ICC.2']] <- params.default[['ICC.2']]
d2.1_m2fc_nbar50_power_plot <- gen.power.results.plot(gen_params_file_base(user.params.list, sim.params.list, design), design)
print(d2.1_m2fc_nbar50_power_plot)
```

# MDES validation

```{r}
user.params.list <- params.default 
```


```{r 2c.mdes.D1}
design <- "d2.1_m2fc"
user.params.list[['omega.2']] <- 0
params.file.base <- gen_params_file_base(user.params.list, sim.params.list, design)
mdes.file <- find_file(params.file.base, type = 'mdes_D1indiv')
if(length(mdes.file) == 0)
{
  warning(paste('Results not yet computed for given parameters:', params.file.base))
} else
{
  d2.1_m2fc_mdes_D1_results <- readRDS(mdes.file)
  pander::pandoc.table(
    d2.1_m2fc_mdes_D1_results,
    style = "grid", split.tables = 100, row.names = FALSE, 
    caption = design
  )
}
```

    style = "grid", split.tables = 100, row.names = FALSE,
    caption = design
  )
}
